name: Bittersweet Journey
description:
What if you were to shake up your daily routine a little? DESCRIPTION

You wake up one day, determined to travel the world in order to learn more about yourself and the world around you. The path you take will be filled with encounters and new experiences.

CONTROLS
  • Move withs arrow keys 
  • Interact with E
MADE BY

SUSLU Matéo (Game Designer /Narrative Designer)

SIVINIANT Alan (Graphic Designer / Game Designer)

LHUILIER Hugo (Game Dev)

SKOTNICKI Nathan (Sound Designer / Narrative Designer)

SCHNEIDER Thomas (Game Dev)

SHIH Émilie (Graphic Designer / Game Dev)

Created at Unijam 2022

Winner of the Public Choice Award (Sponsored by Asobo Studio)
